title: NextHood
short: NextHood is a community-driven platform to report & resolve neighborhood issues.
description: NextHood enables residents, volunteers and authorities to report potholes, garbage, streetlight outages, and suspicious activities with geo-tagged photos, voting and status updates.

title: StudentCart
description: A document submission platform optimized for students to upload scanned documents remotely. Uses Java Modulith, Spring Security with JWT and MySQL.

title: FieldGuard
description: FieldGuard monitors field workers (attendance, docs and reports). Backend built with Spring Boot, JUnit coverage and modulith patterns.

title: Banking Application
description: Implemented microservice-style banking APIs: accounts, transactions and basic security patterns for learning.
